title: Spontaneous Assembly
outcome: As BCI remains crippled, locals organize free zones where residents self-assign roles and share resources, ignoring BCI scores. Spontaneous democracy emerges, drawing mass participation. Council debates intervention, provoking internal split as free zones threaten centralized control and transform daily life in Stenograd.

events.description: Residents in multiple districts set up free zones where BCI scores are ignored and roles are chosen by consensus.
Self-organized councils form in the free zones. Food, work, and healthcare are redistributed by local agreement, bypassing central assignment.
Word of these collectives spreads quickly; more citizens join, leading to thriving pockets of non-compliance and self-governance.
Council security officials demand crackdown while Innovators urge study of the new assemblies. Sharp debates erupt within Council leadership.
Citywide demonstration celebrates free zones; traditional authority erodes further as thousands gather in support of self-rule.
